doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia

Oakland Main entrance probably was on Center Gable wall but now on side Exterior cornice pendants from Asher Benjamin, Country Builders Assistant 1805--Charlottesville Mayor Benjamin Wheeler Home 1902-10--Gerald Lindsay Home--White family home 1812-1891--Menan Mills owner 1799-1811--Original Mantel at Stilwin - reproduction in parlor here

2 Story Brick, Center Pavilion without Wings, Paired Column Portico, Lunette in Gable, Hall-Parlor, 6/9, 9/9, 6 Panel Door, Flemish Bond, 5 Course American Bond, Penciling, Wood Wainscots, Interesting Mantels, Symmetrical Trim, Rondel Blocks
Clay Lancaster, Architecural Historian 1969-70--Thomas Craven, Architect, drawings of original mantels for reproduction here circa 1970
survey data: Virginia Landmarks Register--Studies in Vernacular Architecture--Virginia Road Traces--Work Projects Administration
